about_the_game:
Use your wit and courage to uncover the mysteries hidden in every corner.


The journey to discover the truth is always full of surprises and challenges, especially in the small town of Harstad, which seems to be hiding many untold secrets. Recently, the peace of the town has been shattered by a series of unusual events, and all the clues point to those forgotten underground passages. The mayor has sent out a hero's thread, gathering a group of intrepid explorers who will go deep underground and uncover the veil of ancient mysteries.
The Story of the White Cat Rider is a classic 2D platform-jumping game that takes you through forests and small towns until you reach the bottom of a well and explore the deep and mysterious underground world. Here, you will engage in fierce battles with resurrected demons, meet your partners, and bravely march to the demon's door, step by step to uncover the truth of ancient mysteries.



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Features


Retro charm of side-scrolling jumps: Classic side-scrolling level design, paired with cartoonish art, takes you back to the golden age of gaming.
Smooth 2D control experience: Whether it is melee attack, lunge forward or long-range shooting, combined with a rich skill set, let you navigate the dangerous situation.
Adventure in the underground world: Explore the ancient pathways that have been buried, uncover the conspiracies behind them, and be careful of the crises that lurk in the shadows.
The fun of skill upgrades: As the game progresses, you will constantly unlock new skills, learn new combat techniques, and increase your strength and speed.
Partner Power: Together with your friendly partners, defeat those powerful enemies and make your battle journey no longer alone.

name: White Cat Stories
short_description: "White Cat Rider Story" is a lightweight 2D platformer game. In this game, players take on the role of brave white cat riders on a journey that is both dangerous and magical.
